title: Top Themes Wordpress shopping for Online store
content:
Wordpress is an extremely versatile platform. It was originally created for blogging but nowadays people use it for all kinds of websites. If you are planning to set up an online shop then you should take advantage of this amazing platform. Following are some excellent [URL="http://wpcong.com/top-20-wordpress-shop-themes/"][SIZE=4]wordpress shopping theme[/SIZE][/URL] which you can use to create a fully functional e-commerce site without touching a single line of code. Many of the following themes have integrated shopping cart systems so you don’t need to struggle with complex code and resource-intensive scripts.  
[SIZE=5]Glamo – Responsive WordPress Ecommerce Theme[/SIZE]

MediaCenter Electronics Store WooCommerce Theme is a clean, modern, user friendly, 100% responsive,highly customizable and SEO Friendly base on WordPress Theme. This theme designed for WooCommerce electronics store or other online store type.  
[IMG]http://wpcong.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/10/Glamo-Responsive-WordPress-Ecommerce-Theme.png[/IMG]

[SIZE=5]North | Unique E-Commerce Theme[/SIZE]  
[IMG]http://wpcong.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/10/North-Unique-E-Commerce-Theme.jpg[/IMG]  
North is designed for online store website using Woocommerce plugin on wordpress. Its features are 100% responsive, retina ready, seo clean code, hightly customizable, beautify and unique,…

[SIZE=5]MediaCenter – Electronics Store WooCommerce Theme[/SIZE]  
[IMG]http://wpcong.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/10/MediaCenter-Electronics-Store-WooCommerce-Theme.jpg[/IMG]  
MediaCenter Electronics Store WooCommerce Theme is a clean, modern, user friendly, 100% responsive,highly customizable and SEO Friendly base on WordPress Theme. This theme designed for WooCommerce electronics store or other online store type.

[SIZE=5]Flat Responsive WooCommerce Theme[/SIZE]  
[IMG]http://wpcong.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/10/Flat-Responsive-WooCommerce-Theme.jpg[/IMG]  
Flatsome is a beautiful responsive theme inspired by modern eCommerce designs. It’s designed for your online store like fashion store, shoes store,… This shop theme compatiable with Woocommerce 2.2+, and WordPress 4.0 ready.

[SIZE=5]Bazar Shop – Multi-Purpose e-Commerce Theme[/SIZE]  
[IMG]http://wpcong.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/10/Bazar-Shop-Multi-Purpose-e-Commerce-Theme.jpg[/IMG]  
Bazar eCommerce Theme is a fresh and creative theme that utilises the powerful WooCommerce wordpress plugin to create a very versatile WordPress powered online store website, with unlimited layout options and a lot of unbelievable features. This theme is beautify, easy to using and installing, seo friendly for your shopping website.
